restaurant.name: Chickpeas Mediterranean Grill
restaurant.address: 850 Blackburn Dr, Mobile AL 36608-9443, United States

appetizers.name: Stuffed Grape Leaves / Dolmas (6) with Pita and Taziki Sauce
appetizers.description: Stuffed with mixture of rice, meat, and loads of fresh herbs and spices.

appetizers.name: Patty Melt
appetizers.description: Two smashed beef patties, American and Swiss cheese, grilled onion and southwest sauce served on a wheat or Texas toast.

appetizers.name: Chickpeas Sampler
appetizers.description: Kibbe, hummus, stuffed grape leaves, meat pie, and tabbouleh.

appetizers.name: Falafel
appetizers.description: Ground chickpeas, parsley, cilantro, and spices.

appetizers.name: Za'atar Pita
appetizers.description: Grilled pita bread and topped with za'atar mix and olive oil.

appetizers.name: Beef Sambousek
appetizers.description: Spiced meat filled dough that's fried for maximum flavor.

appetizers.name: Spinach Sambousek
appetizers.description: Dough filled with spinach, onion, tomatoes, and blend of spices.

appetizers.name: Kibbe Rolls (4) with Pita and Taziki Sauce
appetizers.description: Ground beef with bulgur and spices rolled in a shape of football, and stuffed with meat, pine nuts, onion, and spices.

appetizers.name: Hummus with Pita
appetizers.description: Creamy puree of cooked chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, and spices.

appetizers.name: Tabbouleh Salad
appetizers.description: Finely chopped parsley, tomatoes, onions, and soaked uncooked bulgur, seasoned with olive oil, lemon, salt, and pepper.

appetizers.name: Kafta (3) with Pita and Taziki Sauce
appetizers.description: Beef, onion, and parsley seasoned with Mediterranean spices.

salads.name: Greek Falafel Salad
salads.description: Mixture of romaine lettuce, cucumber, tomatoes, red onion, black olives, feta cheese, lemon juice, and olive oil dressing. And topped with three falafels and served with pita and taziki sauce.
salads.note: You can add chicken, beef, or shrimp to any salad for an additional charge.

salads.name: Fattoush
salads.description: Romaine lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, red onions, and parsley, tossed with crispy seasoned pita chips.

salads.name: Chickpeas Salad
salads.description: Chickpeas, cucumber, red bell pepper, cherry tomatoes, red onions, and parsley tossed in our house dressing. Served with pita.

salads.name: House Salad
salads.description: Romaine lettuce, tomatoes, shredded carrots, and green onion.

salads.name: Lentils Salad
salads.description: Brown lentils, red onions, cucumber, shredded carrots, diced tomatoes, parsley, and kale. Served with pita.

sandwiches.name: American Burger
sandwiches.description: Beef patty, lettuce, tomatoes, pickles, red onion, American cheese, and mayo. Served with one side

sandwiches.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
sandwiches.description: Mayo, lettuce, and tomatoes. Add cheese for an additional charge.

sandwiches.name: Beef Shawarma
sandwiches.description: Marinated beef served on a pita bread with lettuce, tomatoes, and red onions, with tzatziki or tahini sauce.

sandwiches.name: Chicken Shawarma
sandwiches.description: Marinated chicken served on a pita bread with lettuce, tomatoes, and red onions with tzatziki or tahini sauce.

sandwiches.name: Falafel Sandwich
sandwiches.description: Falafel, lettuce, tomatoes, and cucumber with tahini or tzatziki sauce.

sandwiches.name: Patty Melt
sandwiches.description: Two smashed beef patties, American and Swiss cheese, grilled onion and southwest sauce served on a wheat or Texas toast.

sandwiches.name: BLT
sandwiches.description: Grilled wheat toast mayo, three slices of bacon. Lettuce and tomatoes.

sandwiches.name: Meatballs Poboy
sandwiches.description: Toasted hoagy bun, four meatballs topped with marinara sauce and Swiss cheese.

entrees.name: Beef Shawarma Platter
entrees.description: Grilled beef marinated and seasoned to perfection, orzo or rice, and roasted vegetables. Served with pita bread and zataar sauce.

entrees.name: Chicken Shawarma Platter
entrees.description: Marinated and grilled chicken served with rice and grilled vegetables.

entrees.name: Lamb Chop Platter
entrees.description: Three lamb chops seasoned and grilled, rice or orzo, and roasted vegetables, and a choice of house salad or soup. Served with pita.

entrees.name: Grilled Shrimp Platter
entrees.description: Seasoned and grilled shrimp served with rice or orso pasta, roasted vegetable and a choice of house salad or soup.

entrees.name: Pesto Shrimp Platter
entrees.description: Grilled shrimp with cherry tomatoes tossed with basil pesto served with rice or orso pasta, roasted vegetable, and a choice of soup or salad.

entrees.name: Salmon with Roasted Vegetables
entrees.description: Salmon poached and grilled served with roasted vegetables, rice or orzo pasta and pita bread with zataar sauce.

entrees.name: Meatloaf Dinner
entrees.description: Served with two sides and corn muffin.

entrees.name: Fried Cat Fish
entrees.description: Served with two sides and corn muffin.

entrees.name: Country Fried Steak
entrees.description: Served with two sides and corn muffin.

entrees.name: Liver and Grilled Onion
entrees.description: Grilled liver, smothered with sauteed onions and covered with brown gravy served with two sides and corn muffin

entrees.name: Smothered Burger Steak
entrees.description: Grilled beef steak covered with sauteed onion and brown or white gravy served with two sides and corn muffins

kids_menu.name: Grilled Cheese
kids_menu.description: Add chicken, beef or shrimp for an additional charge. Served with one side

kids_menu.name: Chicken Tenders
kids_menu.description: Fried comes grilled or with one side of your choice.

kids_menu.name: Kid's Shawarma Sandwich
kids_menu.description: Beef, chicken or shrimp with one side.

breakfast.name: Big Breakfast
breakfast.description: Two eggs cooked to order, choice of meat, one pancake, and biscuit or toast.

breakfast.name: Shrimp and Grits
breakfast.description: Bowl of seasoned grits topped with one egg cooked to order and seasoned grilled shrimp.

breakfast.name: Loaded Avocado Toast
breakfast.description: Grilled wheat toast with Swiss cheese, one fried egg, and mixed greens, topped with a drizzle of olive oil, radish, and herbs and served with tomato salad.

breakfast.name: Hearty Breakfast
breakfast.description: Bowl of homemade hash brown, sautéed onions, chopped steak, and topped with two eggs cooked to order.

breakfast.name: Pancake Breakfast
breakfast.description: Stack of three pancakes, two eggs, and your choice of bacon or link sausage.

breakfast.name: Za'atar Stuffed French Toast
breakfast.description: Two slices of bread soaked in egg, milk, za'atar, oil, and salt, grilled to golden brown melt a slice of Swiss cheese, served with side of tomato salad.

breakfast.name: Biscuit & Gravy and One Protein
breakfast.description: Creamy white gravy on top of two biscuits

breakfast.name: Manoushe
breakfast.description: Grilled pita bread topped with za'atar, olive oil, tomatoes, mixed greens, and feta cheese.

breakfast.name: Egg Shawarma
breakfast.description: Grilled pita bread stuffed with one egg, choice of beef or chicken shawarma, and mixed greens, topped with tahini sauce. Served with one side of your choice.
